PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SwitchingDeviceTypeSelectorSwitch
PropertySetDef.Definition: A selector switch is a switch that adjusts electrical power through a multi-position action. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: SelectorType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of selector switch from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: SwitchActivation
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available activations for selector switches from which that required may be selected.

PropertyDef.Name: SwitchUsage
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available usages for selector switches from which that required may be selected.
